notesstmt.note: A Judeo-Arabic formulae of Psalms, specifying the effects of each Psalm. Apparently in the order of the Psalms, as this fragment contains the effects of Psalms LII-LXII. The effects listed include appeasing an enemy, freeing a prisoner, and obtaining a favor.
Condition: damaged, loss in bottom edge.

msidentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msitem.title: Prescriptions of Psalms for specified problems
